alert.note: Alert for Johnson; Miami (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 30 at 6:27PM CDT by NWS Kansas City
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of western Miami and southwestern Johnson Counties through 715 PM CDT... At 627 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Vinland, or near Baldwin City, moving southeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Olathe, Gardner, Paola, Spring Hill, Osawatomie, Edgerton, Hillsdale, Wagstaff, Clare and Beagle. This includes Interstate 35 in Kansas between mile markers 200 and 214. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
